changeSet.author: mbemis
changeSet.sql: create table BILLING_PROJECT_GROUP ( PROJECT_NAME varchar(254) not null, GROUP_NAME varchar(254) not null, PROJECT_ROLE varchar(254) not null, primary key PK_BILLING_PROJECT_GROUP (PROJECT_NAME, GROUP_NAME), constraint FK_PROJECT_GROUP foreign key (GROUP_NAME) references `GROUP` (NAME), constraint FK_PROJECT_NAME foreign key (PROJECT_NAME) references BILLING_PROJECT (NAME) )

changeSet.author: mbemis
changeSet.sql: insert into `GROUP` select concat("PROJECT_",b.NAME,"-",r.role), concat("GROUP_PROJECT_",b.NAME,"-",r.role,"@","${gcs:appsDomain}") from BILLING_PROJECT b join temp_roles r

changeSet.author: mbemis
changeSet.sql: insert into GROUP_USERS select pu.USER_SUBJECT_ID, concat("PROJECT_",bp.NAME,"-",pu.ROLE) from BILLING_PROJECT bp left join PROJECT_USERS pu on bp.NAME=pu.PROJECT_NAME

changeSet.author: mbemis
changeSet.sql: insert into BILLING_PROJECT_GROUP select b.NAME, concat("PROJECT_",b.NAME,"-",r.role), r.role from BILLING_PROJECT b join temp_roles r
